assets.label: Scrollbearer – Flamebound
assets.description: A unicorn scrollbearer carrying the eternal flame. Central piece of the 3D bundle.

assets.label: Scrollbearer – Vigilant Watch
assets.description: The scrollbearer stands firm under celestial watch, its horn casting shadows of hope.

assets.label: Scrollbearer – Luminous Path
assets.description: A glowing parchment held steady by a vigilant horned guardian, lighting the unseen road.
